intro.p: Use the polynomial f(x) = {{poly}} to answer the questions about its graph.

content.p: What happens to the end behavior of the graph of f(x) as x \to \infty? Explain your reasoning.
What happens to the end behavior of the graph of f(x) as x \to -\infty? Explain your reasoning.
Without finding the x-intercepts, what is the maximum number of x-intercepts f(x) could have? Explain your reasoning.

outtro.p: The max number of x-intercepts would be {{a}}

content.p: Without graphing f(x), what is the maximum number of turning points the graph could have? Explain your reasoning.

outtro.p: The max number of turning points in the graph of f(x) would be {{tp}}
